feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.30.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Points limit exceeded check is now cached.
  • Reverse geocoding for places is now significantly faster.

Changed

  • Stats page should load faster now.
  • Track creation is temporarily disabled.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C, Chris, gesus, Jonah B., Dante, daallex, Tanner A., Matthias B., Milien M., Mathias, Travis S., Michael J., Matthew F., Johnathan D., bleibdirtroy, no1etal,Ashwin C., dixet, Bailey J., Alex D., Benjamin M., Daniel A., Florian and BeeHappy on Patreon and KoFi ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Add cache to points limit exceeded check by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1539
  • Add index on places geodata osm id by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1540
  • Bump the bundler group with 2 updates by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1542
  • Fix/stats page performance by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1550
  • Bump super_diff from 0.15.0 to 0.16.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1496
  • Bump debug from 1.10.0 to 1.11.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1497
  • Bump chartkick from 5.1.5 to 5.2.0 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1498
  • Temporary disable track creation by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1551
  • 0.30.1 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1552

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.30.0...0.30.1

entry.content:

Fixed

  • Stats calculation is now significantly faster.

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.30.3
entry.content:
Changed

  • Track generation is now significantly faster and less resource intensive.

Fixed

  • Distance on the stats page is now rounded. #1548
  • Non-selfhosted users can now export and import their account data.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C, Chris, gesus, Jonah B., Dante, daallex, Tanner A., Matthias B., Milien M., Mathias, Travis S., Michael J., Matthew F., Johnathan D., bleibdirtroy, no1etal,Ashwin C., dixet, Bailey J., Alex D., Benjamin M., Daniel A., Florian, BeeHappy and ChemistryDachshund on Patreon and KoFi ðŸ’™

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.30.4
entry.content:
Added

  • Prometheus metrics are now available at /metrics. Configure METRICS_USERNAME and METRICS_PASSWORD environment variables for basic authentication, default values are prometheus for both. All other prometheus-related environment variables are also necessary.

Fixed

  • The Warden error in jobs is now fixed. #1556
  • The Live Map setting is now respected.
  • The Live Map info modal is now displayed. #665
  • GPX from Basecamp is now supported. #790
  • The "Delete Selected" button is now hidden when no points are selected. #1025

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by Steven B., James Manolios, chenrik, aldumil, derpderpington, Chippie, dint, jhalpern, Lex Fradski, Schlufo, cyberswan.at, craftyklaus, JMyrng, Andre, hogenf, naraxius, Embrace, martin4861, Alex, evetters, GregF, Jon Coffee, Lukas, Robbie G, Kilian, Hans G, Chris, tabaha, Andre, Michael C, Chris, gesus, Jonah B., Dante, daallex, Tanner A., Matthias B., Milien M., Mathias, Travis S., Michael J., Matthew F., Johnathan D., bleibdirtroy, no1etal,Ashwin C., dixet, Bailey J., Alex D., Benjamin M., Daniel A., Florian, BeeHappy and ChemistryDachshund on Patreon and KoFi ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix/warden in jobs by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1565
  • Expose prometheus metrics at /metrics by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1564
  • Fix live map checkbox by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1566
  • Hide "Delete Selected" button when no points are selected. by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1568
  • Implement Basecamp GPX import by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1567
  • 0.30.4 by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/1569

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.30.3...0.30.4
